title: Katie Price's ex toyboy Charles Drury makes savage dig as she declares love for Kris Boyson
text:

Katie Price has confirmed she's back on with Kris Boyson, and her ex toyboy Charles Drury isn't happy about it.

This summer the former glamour model, 41, dumped Kris, 30, by text after she jetted off to Turkey with Charles.

But now she's giving things another go with Kris, Charles has made what appears to be a savage dig about her on Instagram , saying she can't "change her stripes".

The hunky builder, 22, posted a picture of himself looking moody as he posed in a striped polo neck top.

He added a cryptic caption to the photo, saying: "The tiger cannot change its stripes."

(Image: Instagram)

And his followers were convinced he was talking about Katie.

One commented: "I hope not!!! Don’t ever change."

"Charles coming through," another posted with a fire emoji.

"And don't ever change Charlie," a third wrote.

(Image: Instagram)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

It came as Katie used her own Instagram account to declare her love for Kris.

Taking to her stories, she wrote: "The world is going to throw us a million reasons why this isn't going to work out between us, but I'm armed with the one reason why it will..."

She continued: "...I LOVE YOU!" with a hand drawn love heart to sign off the message.

(Image: Facebook)

The mum-of-five shared the message just moments after she posted a deep quote which could also have been aimed at hunky Kris.

"Maybe I'm scared because you mean more to me than any other person," the quote reads.

And it's quite suggestive towards a certain blond beau. The quote continued: "You are everything I think about, everything I need, everything I want."
description: The hunky builder, 22, appeared to say Katie can't 'change her stripes' in a cyrptic Instagram post after she went back to Kris
